title: Scheduling Property Tours on BALL
subtitle: Book appointments to visit properties that interest you.

steps.title: Find a Property of Interest
steps.description: Explore properties listed on the BALL platform and find one that interests you. You can search for properties based on location, type, size, amenities, and price.

steps.title: Request a Tour
steps.description: Once you've found a property you'd like to visit, click on the 'Schedule a Tour' or 'Request a Viewing' button on the property listing page. Fill out the tour request form with your preferred date and time for the tour.

steps.title: Confirmation
steps.description: After submitting your tour request, the property owner or agent will review your request and confirm the tour details. You'll receive a notification once your tour request has been confirmed.

steps.title: Attend the Tour
steps.description: On the scheduled date and time, arrive at the property for your tour appointment. The property owner or agent will be present to show you around the property, answer any questions you may have, and provide additional information.

steps.title: Provide Feedback
steps.description: After the tour, provide feedback to the property owner or agent about your experience and any further questions or concerns you may have. Your feedback helps improve the tour experience for future visitors.
